About Me

Working as a Senior Programmer with Ubisoft India from October 2017. 8+ years experience in game development. Worked on multiple shipped titles from casual to AAA, on platform ranging from mobile to PC & consoles. Expertise in C++, C# and Unity3d game engine. Very familiar with other tools of trade such as Unreal Engine.

Experience

Ubisoft India Entrtainment Pvt. Ltd.

Senior Programmer October 2017 - Present

Used Anvil-Scimitar, Unity3D, C++, C#, Python Responsible for character systems, water systems and inventory load out system. Owned and maintained character system and its integration with other modules such as audio, visual effects, water system, weapon system and cinematic. Implemented and updated various in-house tools as per requirement. Worked on optimization and TRC implementation for Switch, PS4 and Xbox.

Purpletalk India Pvt. Ltd.

Module Lead April 2013 - July 2017

Used Unity3D and C# Worked as lead programmer on 2 titles and as module lead on 1 title. Worked on system architecture of various reusable modules. Worked closely with clients as programming lead and helped them to ease into different tasks such as integrating 3rd party tools. Some of titles were: Adventure Time- Champions and Challengers - Cartoon Network, Ever After High - Mattel, Fionna Fights - Cartoon Network, Ride'em Rigby - Cartoon Network, Monster High - Mattel, Grow- Fisher Price.

Gujarat Technological University

Completed it with 7.74 CGPA.
